info.name: StreamCloud for Subtitles
info.description: This Theme makes the Progress-Bar transparent, moves it and makes it bigger in order to make Video-Subtitles readable again and enhance the StreamCloud experience.
info.additionalInfo:
This Theme makes the Progress-Bar transparent, moves it and makes it bigger in order to make Video-Subtitles readable again and enhance the StreamCloud experience.

with Auto-Turn-Light-Off-Mode

works 2015
